title.enable_60_fps_tooltip.message: May require additional GPU/CPU resources. Note that toggling this option will trigger source refresh. For best performance, enable Browser Source Special Optimization under Tools -> Settings -> Advanced.

title.hint.content_section.message: Enter your text here. You can use &lt;br&gt; to insert line break(s). You can also use BBcode to further format your text. Click [here](https://xspl.it/bbcode) to learn more.

title.deprecated_scripts.message: The script being used in this text source contains some deprecated script methods. Update the script by doing the following:[br]1. Click on 'Edit Script' button in the Text tab[br]2. Select script template and press 'Update Text' button

title.outdated_scripts.message: The script being used in this text source may be outdated. You may update the script by doing the following:[br]1. Click on 'Edit Script' button in the Text tab[br]2. Select script template, configure settings, and press 'Update Text' button

title.help.outline_message.message: There is a limitation for font size when using outline. You can resize the text source in your stage. but the text will only adjust up to the maximum font size.

title.help.pause_script_message.message: You can pause/play a supported script such as the timer and duration modes of the general purpose clock script and other supporting custom scripts.

title.help.delimeter_message.message: A delimiter is a character or set of characters that will separate the text into segments to be shown per fade effect.

title.help.interval_message.message: Interval is the time a text will be displayed before another fade effect will happen.

title.pause_hotkey.message: When source is selected in the stage, you may use hotkey (Press "P") to pause/play supported script.
